name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.namenode.max-num-blocks-to-log
description:
Puts a limit on the number of blocks printed to the log by the Namenode
    after a block report.

name: dfs.namenode.checkpoint.txns
description:
The Secondary NameNode or CheckpointNode will create a checkpoint
  of the namespace every 'dfs.namenode.checkpoint.txns' transactions, regardless
  of whether 'dfs.namenode.checkpoint.period' has expired.

name: dfs.storage.policy.satisfier.queue.limit
description:
Storage policy satisfier queue size. This queue contains the currently
    scheduled file's inode ID for statisfy the policy.
    Default value is 1000.

name: dfs.namenode.resource.checked.volumes.minimum
description: The minimum number of redundant NameNode storage volumes required.

name: net.topology.script.number.args
description:
The max number of args that the script configured with
    net.topology.script.file.name should be run with. Each arg is an
    IP address.

name: dfs.client.cached.conn.retry
description:
The number of times the HDFS client will pull a socket from the
   cache.  Once this number is exceeded, the client will try to create a new
   socket.

name: dfs.namenode.fs-limits.min-block-size
description:
Minimum block size in bytes, enforced by the Namenode at create
      time. This prevents the accidental creation of files with tiny block
      sizes (and thus many blocks), which can degrade performance. Support multiple
      size unit suffix(case insensitive), as described in dfs.blocksize.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.scheduler.heartbeat.interval-ms
description:
The interval in ms at which the MR AppMaster should send
    heartbeats to the ResourceManager
